greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Exponential transform of Pascal's triangle A007318.
comment: Triangle T(n,k), 0 <= k <= n, read by rows, given by [1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, ...] DELTA [1, 1, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 4, 1, 5, 1, 6, ...] where DELTA is the operator defined in A084938. - _Philippe Deléham_, Aug 10 2005
link: Index entries for triangles and arrays related to Pascal's triangle
xref: Cf. A000110, A007318. Row sums give A055882.
results.author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jun 09 2000
